content.description: Source: Adapted from data in James N. Gregory, The Southern Diaspora: How the Great Migrations of Black and White Southerners Transformed America, 2005.
content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the trend in African American migration shown on the graph between 1900 and 1929 ?

choices.label: A surplus of affordable housing available in the North and West
A desire to achieve religious freedom in the North and West
An effort to escape violence and limited opportunity in the South
A chance to own and farm large tracts of land in the South

content.answer: An effort to escape violence and limited opportunity in the South
